name: Florida Catholic Conference Provincial Schools Accreditation
description: FCCPSA provides accreditation services for Catholic schools in Florida, ensuring they meet both academic excellence standards and the educational mission of the Catholic Church. Schools demonstrate commitment to faith formation, academic rigor, and service to the community.
recognition: FCCPSA accreditation is recognized by the Florida Department of Education and the Catholic Church. Credits and diplomas are accepted by colleges and universities.
